We conduct literacy classes vocational training moral and value education health and hygiene counseling. Deserving girls are helped for higher studies nursing interior decoration tailoring computer and beautician course. Children are given formal education in different schools and colleges. They are trained to take care of the environment protect and care for it. given classes to manage the waste. Books uniforms other study materials and play equipment are given for their overall development.Regular medical checkup and treatment balanced diet health awareness classes are given to the girls. Classes are conducted on personnel and environmental hygiene and sanitation. Children are given counseling sessions in order to come out from their traumatic experiences. We have an outreach program to empower women and children A self help group is organized. We conduct tuition classes for school going children and also training in various skills for women and girls. Some of them are already able to stand by themselves. A good number of girls have completed their carrier and working. Many are settled in marriage.
